trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that have been removed from lasso path since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得已從套索路徑自從上次筆劃<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref>引發事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is removed from the lasso path when it is no longer within the bounds of the lasso path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>移除從套索路徑時不會再套索路徑的範圍內</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the strokes that have been removed from the lasso path since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含已從套索路徑自從上次筆劃<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref>引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the strokes that have been surrounded by the lasso path since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得已自前次圍繞著套索路徑的筆劃<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref>引發事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that contains the strokes that have been surrounded by the lasso path since the last time the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含已自前次圍繞著套索路徑的筆劃<xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"></xref>引發事件。
